snippet.title: 메트로 블로썸 - Metro Blossom
snippet.description:
"선택과 주사위가 만드는 텍스트 RPG"
시체꽃이 만개한 서울, 하나뿐인 가족 메리를 찾기 위해
지하철 역을 따라 위험한 여정을 시작합니다.

In Search of Lost Merry - Text RPG “Metro Blossom”
After day X, unknown pollen strikes Seoul. Those who breathe in the pollen become a zombie called ‘Blooming Dead’, as it resembles a flower from afar. The survivors come to live in subway. Along with the route map, you will be exposed to a unique worldview, rolling dice to make countless choices.

* English/Japanese version to be released within 2022.
